Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Feature: Stage 12 - External Bot API

New features:
- /api command - search, download and send to target chat
- /api_search - search only, returns track list
- /api_download - download by video ID
- API key authentication via .env
- API_instructions.md documentation

Updates:
- TODO.md - marked all stages as completed
- Synced local files with server
